title: Review on the GOAT App
review: Iâ€™ve noticed a lot of the reviews on the App Store are based on everyoneâ€™s personal experience with GOAT purchases after the fact and their costumer service. However Iâ€™d like to review the App itself, the UI, and the design. Starting with the App itself, I freakin love it. The idea behind buying and selling shoes easily on 1 platform is what has caused the attraction to this app. I will say I have experienced my fair share of issues as well... (app crashes, issues loading/reloading results, erasing shoe â€œwantsâ€ù list) overall though, pretty impressed; nothing crazy. As far as the UI and design, I do like the simplicity of its interface and how easy it is to find, purchase, and/or sell sneakers.  A couple of my gripes come from my experience when browsing or searching for sneakers. Iâ€™ve noticed when I search for a specific sneaker and click on a shoe, the keyboard pops up every time I return to my original search results. Very annoying for browsing/shopping. I have to dismiss the keyboard before I continue scrolling. Not sure if itâ€™s intentional or not because it happens every time you search for something, but I canâ€™t understand the reasoning behind it. Second issue is with the filter feature and its options. Why on earth is there not a filter for price anywhere on this app? Makes no sense to me to have one for something as specific as color but not price; to me price is a more important criteria even before you get to color. THIS ABSOLUTELY NEEDS TO BE ADDED IN THE NEXT UPDATE. Will make browsing and searching for sneakers so much easier and faster. WIN-WIN! In addition to that, sorting features for price should be added as well. If Iâ€™m browsing through the main page for sneakers, maybe I donâ€™t want to see all the ones that cost $300+ a pair all the time. Sometimes I wanna see the cheaper sneakers! Being able to sort the page by price will allow me to do that. Simple modification that will make this app 10X better. Thanks for reading this long review. Hopefully some of the Developers from GOAT catch this and make a change or two. Sincerely,Happy GOAT Customer

title: The worst

I do not recommend anyone buy or sell with this app. The first pair of shoes I ever ordered (kith mids) were shipped to me ripped. They listed a shoe under the wrong gender based on code and when it sold they canceled my sell and upped my commission because of their error. Honestly, this app is nothing but a headache. Trust and believe all these one star reviews, Use stock X or Grailed.

EVERYTHING WAS PERFECT. the prices werenâ€™t high the process was easy and itâ€™s really nice. i bought multiple shoes from goat like sport blue 6, black toe 14, royalty 4, white yin yang 1 and a lot more. i trust goat more than any other shoe website and itâ€™s a lot better cause the prices were below retail and the app is really easy to work. i bought french blue 12 size 11 for $175 and usually now they go for around $270+. i would HIGHLY recommend this app to anyone who collects shoes or is just looking for a pair. and the best part is when you buy a shoe the app tells you whatâ€™s going on. first the seller confirms and boxes the shoe, then ships to goat, goat then verifies the shoe(if itâ€™s fake you get a FULL refund), then they ship it to you and you get your shoes. best shoe app!!!

title: Good app, bad update
review: A lot of people in these comments don't seem to realize but it's a resale service, it's slow. Should've known that when you signed up. That being said, when it takes 2 weeks for shoes to go from the seller to the verification center that's also a problem. Of the shoes I've bought I've had mostly good results. 2 perfectly smooth transactions and 1 which I had to return due to a discoloration. They offered a full refund however it still would've been nice to never get a pair of damaged shoes in the first place.Regarding the new update, when going through the searched shoes you cannot hide the keyboard, taking up half the screen and really annoying. It also seems like it wiped a lot of listings. There was a shoe I was looking at (to replace the ones I returned once I got refunded) which was available in every size and now all listings are completely gone. The only feature I would like would be to contact sellers selling damaged items. If it says "new with markings" it's not always easy to see where or how bad the markings are.

title: Customer Service is awful
review: I ordered a pair of Yeezy Belugas from GOAT and waited 4 days to get an update on the shoes. They said that theyâ€™re trying to reach the seller and, if they canâ€™t, they will try to find me another pair. Finally on the 5th day I got a notification that the shoes were on their way to GOAT for authentication. Finally on the 10th day when I emailed them about the shoes, they told me the seller bailed on the sale. Their policy is to notify you after 72 hours as to whether or not the transaction would come to fruition. However, after those 10 days when I got a refund I tried to look for another pair, but the market had moved up $100. I told them that they broke policy but they are avoiding answering my question or admitting guilt and because of them I had to pay more for the same shoes. I told them I could have bought them for $10 more after 72 hours because they were still listed on GOAT and StockX for a decent price. But after 10 days the price went up a lot. When I question them about it they avoid answering. They straight up keep telling me they gave me a refund. I inquired about this 5 times and each time they avoid answering my question as to why they were negligent and just respond with, the amount has been refunded to your account. Extremely unprofessional. Be aware when purchasing.

title: Good App!
review: I ordered some NMD R1 Japan Triple Black, they took 6-7 to come to my house, everything was in order, the shoes were new and looked great. I would recommend this app, the only thing is that i feel that the app is somewhat new, so i could see why people could complain, i hope that in the future the GOAT app grows and that they donâ€™t take advantage of their customers by making them pay way more than they are worth, but overall great app.

title: Great app, small critiques
review: Iâ€™ve bought 2 pairs of shoes (so far) on goat and itâ€™s one of the best places to buy. I love that they make sure the shoe isnâ€™t a fake and their communication of where your shoe is in the shipping process. However, there are some small tweaks I would make. First off, if you want to sell on goat, be prepared to wait almost a month just get verification (yes they it takes about 18 business days.) I would like a feature where when you look at a shoeâ€™s prices, it would jump right to your shoe size you have as default (of if in want page, the size you have.) It can be long and tedious if youâ€™re just checking on the different prices and you have to scroll through pages of shoe sizes you donâ€™t care about.

title: Quicker Shipping

title: Bad way to communicate with customers
review: I place an order to by 750boost yeezys and the app messed up my address I immediately try contacting support but no one answers the emails or chat, it took 4 hours for someone to answer me than the second attempt took 7 hours. Im trying to not get my 1k shoes I just paid for not shipped to the wrong place but they make it impossible to get a hold of someone. They need to have an phone number where people can reach out and fix problems right away not this email tag game that they play. If I would've know it was going to be like this since the beginning I would've never spend my money on this app, they are wasting my time. Do not get this app, is frustrating and they don't value customers time at all.

title: Irritating slow
review: The process is a good idea, so you get authentic shoes. The fact i ordered shoes and didn't get them for two weeks is ridiculous. They guarantee 7-10 days and didn't get them until 13 days later. They ship UPS slowest rate, the sellers aren't required to ship to them fast. Should USPS 2 Day to the facility, USPS 2 day back to you.

title: Shoes purchased are not promised
review: Paid for a pair of sneakers that were confirmed by seller. Seller never sent the shoes after I received a confirmation that the shoes were on their way through UPS. Seller basically reneged on the deal and now the shoes cost way more and the Goat says they'll refund me. Now they expect me to pay more on a new bid when I'm already paying a premium on the shoe, instead of them paying the difference on the new order after confirming that the original shoes were in transit. Why should I miss out after they confirmed the shoe was coming. If they had a better system I could've possibly bought the sneaker from another seller the same price or lower. I already have purchased other sneakers and want to buy more but this left a sour taste. Poor customer service because in a store if something you bought was damaged or misplaced you would get the same item at the price you bought it, might I add, a discount. I'll edit this review if it turns out that they did the right thing and honor my initial purchase.

title: Good prices, bad wait time

When you buy the shoes the actual seller has to verify that you bought it(took a whole day for that stage) then he has to ship it to "goat" it's been 6 days for me and it's still at that stage after wards when goat receives the shoe they make sure it's not fake then they deliver it to you. Again way to long of a process to be charged for it I understand charging people out of country(US) but for people inside its kind of bs if shipping was free it would be a solid 5 stars

title: Disappointed
review: I ordered a less expensive pair of shoes (still $160) trying the app out and everything went good. So I ordered an expensive pair ($300)and received them and the box was damaged. I choose to pay extra to get the box because they offer the shoe without or with a "damaged box" for less. So I contacted customer services and I was told that the best they can do is give me a ten dollar credit on my next buy. If that was the case I could have paid less for a pair that said "damage box" and saved a lot more than $10 I have spent almost $500 with them and they can not even take care of something that it says it covers. Makes me wonder if they are really authenticating the shoes and box like they claim or if so why my damaged box would pass their quality control check.

title: GOAT Cheats SELLERS
review: Let's just say, on 3 occasions GOAT claimed items were missing (plastic cover for Jordan 11's)  or the shoes had marks or damages. GOAT will email you Asking to offer the buyer a discount because of the "damage" yet I believe they are trying to ft more money from sellers.The first time there was a "black mark" on a pair of brand new Jordan 1's which I only took out the box to upload photos. It looked like someone rubbed their finger in thick dust and wiped on the shoe. Given I am a neat freak, I KNOW I DIDN'T do it! I gave goat the benefit of the doubt and offered a 10% discount. The next time when my Jordan 11's sold, I purposely recorded my self (surveillance cameras in my office) unpacking and repacking the shoes jic GOAT tried to pull a fast one. Glad I did because I sure got an email asking to discount for the. Just due to a "missing plastic lid."  I quickly replied and told them to look again given I recorded every moment from the shoes being removed from the box, inspected, boxed up and picked up by UPS. No discount offered. Minutes later the "buyer accepted."GOAT works if you want to sell your shoesJust cya and document EVERYTHING. They will NICKLE AND DIME you every chance they get especially if it's a high demand sneaker!

title: Everyone Else Is Competing for 2nd Place...
review: 8/8/17 Update: This app has become its namesake. It really IS the "GOAT". I've run into issues at times...anywhere from cc fraud, to lost packages, to items arriving damaged.... and their customer service is THE BEST! Being able to start an "in-app" message to contact a customer rep if there's a problem or even if I have a question needing answered, and being notified through a pop-up notification that there's a response...is terrific! I couldn't ask for better service, really. (Unlike a competitor's app, where you can only contact them through email and they sometimes respond, or will respond and then drop off the face of the earth and you not hear from them again without them leaving their customer's satisfied). I've experienced the same or similar issues with other apps, and they just can't and don't compare to the service with GOAT. Sorry, but everyone else is competing for 2nd place. The ONLY thing I can nitpick with this time around is with "Last Prices Sold". Its given for each shoe size. Every sneaker buyer and seller knows that nearly every size shoe sells at a price different from the next size shoe. I'd like to know more specifics about not only the last prices sold, but the prices for which specific shoe sizes as well. It'd be more helpful for both sellers and buyers. Anyway, I'd just like to commend the GOAT APP team! We users all appreciate the hard work that goes into creating and maintaining the app as well as the behind the scenes efforts. And please...PLEASE continue to keep shipping at $10! Lol Keep up the great work!

review: Honestly as a buyer got no complaints. The only thing that bother me was the wait from the seller itself. It felt forever for the seller to send the shoes to the warehouse for verification. I was trying to get the shoes for a trip I was going to but couldn't. Overall great experience for my first purchase, I'm going to keep making purchases in the App. There's still lots of tweaks and stuff they can work on but love the app.

title: SCAM THIS APP IS TRASH NO BUYER PROTECTION

title: Better off with eBay
review: I found shoes I wanted. Within 5 minutes of ordering the shoes, I found the same shoes half the price. I went to cancel the order. I couldn't cancel because the owner "confirmed" the sale. There's no cancel option once the owner accepts sale. It was within 5-10 minutes of me ordering the shoes. NEVER AGAIN.

title: Confident, secure, and sneaker heads.
review: These three things are what makes up the GOAT app. It's confident in being the middle man in exchanging and selling sneakers for prices at retail and below. They're a secure sneaker seller brand and have your shoes and wallet in safe hands. But one thing that ties this app all together is how appealing the app is to us sneaker heads which allows us to buy & sell shoes like they should. I've been using it for a while now and I respect the effort and time they put into GOAT to make it amazing!

title: One of the best sneaker apps out there.
review: GOAT is one of the best sneaker apps in the market today. Their prices are great, and service is excellent. You are notified in every step in the delivery process, and sneakers are guaranteed authentic.
